name: ReadNews
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: read news
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to full podcast of news article or blog posts! Say "News BBC.com" or "News NYTimes" to listen to the headlines & say "Read Next" or "Read First" to hear the full detailed podcast of the headlines one by one. 


By Read News,You can listen to podcast of the full content of any website article or blog post - Only English language ones

First invoke the app
Step 1: Say Open Read News
Step 2: Say "News BBC.com" or "News NYTimes" 
Step 3: After Headlines are read, Say Read Next or Read First to read the first news item in "DETAIL" (will read the entire content)
Step 4: Say Read Next to read the next news item in Detail


You can also use these utterances
Read First - Will read first news item in Detail
Read Last - Will read last news item in Detail
Read Previous - Will read previous news item in detail
Read Next - Will read next news item in Detail
Repeat - Will repeat the news item or news
Repeat News - Will repeat the news

Contact me @Ramanean on Twitter with suggestions!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
